channel.title: What is wrong here? (Cutsom interface)

item.title: What is wrong here? (Cutsom interface)
item.dc:creator: @Quintorz Quintorz
item.description:
@Quintorz wrote:

public static void SocialMedia(RSFont[] TDA) { RSInterface rsinterface = addScreenInterface(20010); addSprite(20011, 0, "Interfaces/Social/BACKGROUND"); addHoverButton(20012, "Interfaces/Social/FACEBOOK", 0, 80, 80, "Open Facebook", -1, 20013, 1); addHoveredButton(20013, "Interfaces/Social/FACEBOOK", 1, 80, 80, 20014); addText(20015, "Facebook", TDA, 2, 0x00BFFF, false, true); addHoverButton(20016, "Interfaces/Social/YOUTUBE", 0, 80, 80, "Open Youtube", -1, 20017, 1); addHoveredButton(20017, "Interfaces/Social/YOUTUBE", 1, 80, 80, 20018); addText(20019, "Youtube", TDA, 2, 0xFF0000, false, true); addText(20020, "Social Media", TDA, 2, 0xFFA500, false, true); addButton(20021, 0, "Interfaces/Social/CLOSE", "Close"); setChildren(7, rsinterface); setBounds(20011, 0, 0, 0, rsinterface);//backgorund setBounds(20012, 100, 125, 1, rsinterface);//hooverbutton setBounds(20015, 77, 157, 2, rsinterface);//Facebook text setBounds(20016, 400, 125, 3, rsinterface);//hooverbutton setBounds(20019, 384, 157, 4, rsinterface);//Youtube text setBounds(20020, 217, 10, 5, rsinterface);//Social media text setBounds(20021, 485, 6, 6, rsinterface);//close interface button }

  • i added the : SocialMedia(rsFonts);
    at the top.

Pic of where the pics r : http://prntscr.com/54hnl2 (they r .png photoes)

ive been messing with it for quite some time and i cnt seem to find out why it isnt popping up
So help pl0x ?

Nothing pops up when i type ::interface 20010 ingameâ€¦
